string.value: You should ask #b#p2060000##k of #b#m230010201##k about how to raise a wolf.

#p2060000# says that she knows a bit about raising wolves and tells you that she will make #bWolf Pup Formula#k for the weakened baby wolf. The ingredients for the formula include #b#t4000157##k, which can be found on seals, and #t4032331#, which #b#p2060005##k sells.

#i4000157# #t4000157# #b#c4000157# / 50#k
#i4032331# #t4032331# #b#c4032331# / 1#k
Armed with all the ingredients, #p2060000# asked you to wait while she finishes making the #t4032332#.

Oh, are you raising a wolf, by any chance? I've seen plenty of people raising dogs, but wolves…not so much. Oh yes, you were asking how to raise a wolf? Well, I have had to tend to an injured wolf before, so I know a a little about raising wolves.

If the wolf pup seems weakened, that's because it's malnourished. I created a formula for wolf pups that's a bit different from the formula for huskies, and it's called #b#t4032332##k. If you want some for your pup, I'll make some for you.
Now I'll need you to bring me the ingredients for the formula. Please get me: #b50 #t4000157#s#k and #b#t4032331##k. You can probably get some vitamins from #p2060005# in #m230000003# on Aqua Road.
Once you bring me all the ingredients, I'll make you some #t4032332#. See you soon.
Hmmm…you don't need any formula? So you're not actually raising a wolf, you're just researching or something...?
Oh wow, did you bring all the ingredients already? Okay then… I'm going to go ahead and make the #t4032332# right now, so talk to me in a bit.

Did you get the ingredients for the #t4032332#? I need #b50 #t4000157#s#k and #b1 #t4032331##k. You can find #t4000157# by #bhunting seals#k in Aqua Road and the vitamins from #b#p2060005#, who sells them in #m230000003##k.
